quote: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily, even if you had no title or position. – Brian Tracy
fact: "Evaluation and Parameterization of Stability and Safety Performance Characteristics of Two and Three Wheeled Vehicular Toys for Riding." Title of a $230,000 research project proposed by the Department of Health, Education and Welfare, to study the various ways children fall off bicycles.
joke: What did the Buffalo say to his little boy when he dropped him off at school? Bison.
